name: nativescript-barcodescanner
description: Scan QR/barcodes with your NativeScript app.

scripts.build: npm i && ts-patch install && npm run tsc
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.postclone: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-barcodescanner && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo-vue.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --bundle
scripts.demo-vue.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --bundle
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-barcodescanner && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link

author: Eddy Verbruggen <eddyverbruggen@gmail.com>
